00028 /*
00029  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00030  * Lustre is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00031  *
00032  * lustre/ofd/ofd_fs.c
00033  *
00034  * This file provides helper functions to handle various data stored on disk.
00035  * It uses OSD API and works with any OSD.
00036  *
00037  * Note: this file contains also functions for sequence handling, they are
00038  * placed here improperly and will be moved to the ofd_dev.c and ofd_internal.h,
00039  * this comment is to be removed after that.
00040  *
00041  * Author: Alexey Zhuravlev <alexey.zhuravlev@intel.com>
00042  * Author: Mikhail Pershin <mike.pershin@intel.com>
00043  */

00045 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_FILTER

00047 #include "ofd_internal.h"

00061 int ofd_precreate_batch(struct ofd_device *ofd, int batch)
00062 {
00063         int count;
00064 
00065         spin_lock(&ofd->ofd_batch_lock);
00066         count = min(ofd->ofd_precreate_batch, batch);
00067         spin_unlock(&ofd->ofd_batch_lock);
00068 
00069         return count;
00070 }
00071 
00084 struct ofd_seq *ofd_seq_get(struct ofd_device *ofd, u64 seq)
00085 {
00086         struct ofd_seq *oseq;
00087 
00088         read_lock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00089         list_for_each_entry(oseq, &ofd->ofd_seq_list, os_list) {
00090                 if (ostid_seq(&oseq->os_oi) == seq) {
00091                         atomic_inc(&oseq->os_refc);
00092                         read_unlock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00093                         return oseq;
00094                 }
00095         }
00096         read_unlock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00097         return NULL;
00098 }
00099 
00109 void ofd_seq_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_seq *oseq)
00110 {
00111         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&oseq->os_refc)) {
00112                 LASSERT(list_empty(&oseq->os_list));
00113                 LASSERT(oseq->os_lastid_obj != NULL);
00114                 lu_object_put(env, &oseq->os_lastid_obj->do_lu);
00115                 OBD_FREE_PTR(oseq);
00116         }
00117 }
00118 
00134 static struct ofd_seq *ofd_seq_add(const struct lu_env *env,
00135                                    struct ofd_device *ofd,
00136                                    struct ofd_seq *new_seq)
00137 {
00138         struct ofd_seq *os = NULL;
00139 
00140         write_lock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00141         list_for_each_entry(os, &ofd->ofd_seq_list, os_list) {
00142                 if (ostid_seq(&os->os_oi) == ostid_seq(&new_seq->os_oi)) {
00143                         atomic_inc(&os->os_refc);
00144                         write_unlock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00145                         /* The seq has not been added to the list */
00146                         ofd_seq_put(env, new_seq);
00147                         return os;
00148                 }
00149         }
00150         atomic_inc(&new_seq->os_refc);
00151         list_add_tail(&new_seq->os_list, &ofd->ofd_seq_list);
00152         ofd->ofd_seq_count++;
00153         write_unlock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00154         return new_seq;
00155 }
00156 
00164 u64 ofd_seq_last_oid(struct ofd_seq *oseq)
00165 {
00166         u64 id;
00167 
00168         spin_lock(&oseq->os_last_oid_lock);
00169         id = ostid_id(&oseq->os_oi);
00170         spin_unlock(&oseq->os_last_oid_lock);
00171 
00172         return id;
00173 }
00174 
00181 void ofd_seq_last_oid_set(struct ofd_seq *oseq, u64 id)
00182 {
00183         spin_lock(&oseq->os_last_oid_lock);
00184         if (likely(ostid_id(&oseq->os_oi) < id))
00185                 ostid_set_id(&oseq->os_oi, id);
00186         spin_unlock(&oseq->os_last_oid_lock);
00187 }
00188 
00204 int ofd_seq_last_oid_write(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd,
00205                            struct ofd_seq *oseq)
00206 {
00207         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(env);
00208         u64                      tmp;
00209         struct dt_object        *obj = oseq->os_lastid_obj;
00210         struct thandle          *th;
00211         int                      rc;
00212 
00213         ENTRY;
00214 
00215         tmp = cpu_to_le64(ofd_seq_last_oid(oseq));
00216 
00217         info->fti_buf.lb_buf = &tmp;
00218         info->fti_buf.lb_len = sizeof(tmp);
00219         info->fti_off = 0;
00220 
00221         LASSERT(obj != NULL);
00222 
00223         th = dt_trans_create(env, ofd->ofd_osd);
00224         if (IS_ERR(th))
00225                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(th));
00226 
00227         rc = dt_declare_record_write(env, obj, &info->fti_buf,
00228                                      info->fti_off, th);
00229         if (rc < 0)
00230                 GOTO(out, rc);
00231         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, ofd->ofd_osd, th);
00232         if (rc < 0)
00233                 GOTO(out, rc);
00234         rc = dt_record_write(env, obj, &info->fti_buf, &info->fti_off,
00235                              th);
00236         if (rc < 0)
00237                 GOTO(out, rc);
00238 
00239         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "%s: write last_objid "DOSTID": rc = %d\n",
00240                ofd_name(ofd), POSTID(&oseq->os_oi), rc);
00241         EXIT;
00242 out:
00243         dt_trans_stop(env, ofd->ofd_osd, th);
00244         return rc;
00245 }
00246 
00259 static void ofd_deregister_seq_exp(struct ofd_device *ofd)
00260 {
00261         struct seq_server_site  *ss = &ofd->ofd_seq_site;
00262 
00263         if (ss->ss_client_seq != NULL) {
00264                 lustre_deregister_lwp_item(&ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp);
00265                 ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp = NULL;
00266         }
00267 
00268         if (ss->ss_server_fld != NULL) {
00269                 lustre_deregister_lwp_item(&ss->ss_server_fld->lsf_control_exp);
00270                 ss->ss_server_fld->lsf_control_exp = NULL;
00271         }
00272 }
00273 
00283 static void ofd_fld_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd)
00284 {
00285         struct seq_server_site *ss = &ofd->ofd_seq_site;
00286 
00287         if (ss != NULL && ss->ss_server_fld != NULL) {
00288                 fld_server_fini(env, ss->ss_server_fld);
00289                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ss->ss_server_fld);
00290                 ss->ss_server_fld = NULL;
00291         }
00292 }
00293 
00304 void ofd_seqs_free(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd)
00305 {
00306         struct ofd_seq          *oseq;
00307         struct ofd_seq          *tmp;
00308         struct list_head         dispose;
00309 
00310         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&dispose);
00311         write_lock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00312         list_for_each_entry_safe(oseq, tmp, &ofd->ofd_seq_list, os_list)
00313                 list_move(&oseq->os_list, &dispose);
00314         write_unlock(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00315 
00316         while (!list_empty(&dispose)) {
00317                 oseq = container_of0(dispose.next, struct ofd_seq, os_list);
00318                 list_del_init(&oseq->os_list);
00319                 ofd_seq_put(env, oseq);
00320         }
00321 }
00322 
00332 void ofd_seqs_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd)
00333 {
00334         int rc;
00335 
00336         ofd_deregister_seq_exp(ofd);
00337 
00338         rc = ofd_fid_fini(env, ofd);
00339         if (rc != 0)
00340                 CERROR("%s: fid fini error: rc = %d\n", ofd_name(ofd), rc);
00341 
00342         ofd_fld_fini(env, ofd);
00343 
00344         ofd_seqs_free(env, ofd);
00345 
00346         LASSERT(list_empty(&ofd->ofd_seq_list));
00347 }
00348 
00362 struct ofd_seq *ofd_seq_load(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd,
00363                              u64 seq)
00364 {
00365         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(env);
00366         struct ofd_seq          *oseq = NULL;
00367         struct dt_object        *dob;
00368         u64                      lastid;
00369         int                      rc;
00370 
00371         ENTRY;
00372 
00373         /* if seq is already initialized */
00374         oseq = ofd_seq_get(ofd, seq);
00375         if (oseq != NULL)
00376                 RETURN(oseq);
00377 
00378         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(oseq);
00379         if (oseq == NULL)
00380                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00381 
00382         lu_last_id_fid(&info->fti_fid, seq, ofd->ofd_lut.lut_lsd.lsd_osd_index);
00383         memset(&info->fti_attr, 0, sizeof(info->fti_attr));
00384         info->fti_attr.la_valid = LA_MODE;
00385         info->fti_attr.la_mode = S_IFREG |  S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR;
00386         info->fti_dof.dof_type = dt_mode_to_dft(S_IFREG);
00387 
00388         /* create object tracking per-seq last created
00389          * id to be used by orphan recovery mechanism */
00390         dob = dt_find_or_create(env, ofd->ofd_osd, &info->fti_fid,
00391                                 &info->fti_dof, &info->fti_attr);
00392         if (IS_ERR(dob)) {
00393                 OBD_FREE_PTR(oseq);
00394                 RETURN((void *)dob);
00395         }
00396 
00397         oseq->os_lastid_obj = dob;
00398 
00399         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&oseq->os_list);
00400         mutex_init(&oseq->os_create_lock);
00401         spin_lock_init(&oseq->os_last_oid_lock);
00402         ostid_set_seq(&oseq->os_oi, seq);
00403 
00404         atomic_set(&oseq->os_refc, 1);
00405 
00406         rc = dt_attr_get(env, dob, &info->fti_attr);
00407         if (rc)
00408                 GOTO(cleanup, rc);
00409 
00410         if (info->fti_attr.la_size == 0) {
00411                 /* object is just created, initialize last id */
00412                 ofd_seq_last_oid_set(oseq, OFD_INIT_OBJID);
00413                 ofd_seq_last_oid_write(env, ofd, oseq);
00414         } else if (info->fti_attr.la_size == sizeof(lastid)) {
00415                 info->fti_off = 0;
00416                 info->fti_buf.lb_buf = &lastid;
00417                 info->fti_buf.lb_len = sizeof(lastid);
00418 
00419                 rc = dt_record_read(env, dob, &info->fti_buf, &info->fti_off);
00420                 if (rc) {
00421                         CERROR("%s: can't read last_id: rc = %d\n",
00422                                 ofd_name(ofd), rc);
00423                         GOTO(cleanup, rc);
00424                 }
00425                 ofd_seq_last_oid_set(oseq, le64_to_cpu(lastid));
00426         } else {
00427                 CERROR("%s: corrupted size "LPU64" LAST_ID of seq "LPX64"\n",
00428                         ofd_name(ofd), (__u64)info->fti_attr.la_size, seq);
00429                 GOTO(cleanup, rc = -EINVAL);
00430         }
00431 
00432         oseq = ofd_seq_add(env, ofd, oseq);
00433         RETURN((oseq != NULL) ? oseq : ERR_PTR(-ENOENT));
00434 cleanup:
00435         ofd_seq_put(env, oseq);
00436         return ERR_PTR(rc);
00437 }
00438 
00449 static int ofd_fld_init(const struct lu_env *env, const char *uuid,
00450                         struct ofd_device *ofd)
00451 {
00452         struct seq_server_site *ss = &ofd->ofd_seq_site;
00453         int rc;
00454 
00455         ENTRY;
00456 
00457         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ss->ss_server_fld);
00458         if (ss->ss_server_fld == NULL)
00459                 RETURN(rc = -ENOMEM);
00460 
00461         rc = fld_server_init(env, ss->ss_server_fld, ofd->ofd_osd, uuid,
00462                              LU_SEQ_RANGE_OST);
00463         if (rc < 0) {
00464                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ss->ss_server_fld);
00465                 ss->ss_server_fld = NULL;
00466                 RETURN(rc);
00467         }
00468         RETURN(0);
00469 }
00470 
00483 static int ofd_register_lwp_callback(void *data)
00484 {
00485         struct lu_env           *env;
00486         struct ofd_device       *ofd = data;
00487         struct lu_server_fld    *fld = ofd->ofd_seq_site.ss_server_fld;
00488         int                     rc;
00489 
00490         ENTRY;
00491 
00492         if (!likely(fld->lsf_new))
00493                 RETURN(0);
00494 
00495         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(env);
00496         if (env == NULL)
00497                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00498 
00499         rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_DT_THREAD);
00500         if (rc < 0)
00501                 GOTO(out, rc);
00502 
00503         rc = fld_update_from_controller(env, fld);
00504         if (rc < 0) {
00505                 CERROR("%s: cannot update controller: rc = %d\n",
00506                        ofd_name(ofd), rc);
00507                 GOTO(out, rc);
00508         }
00509         EXIT;
00510 out:
00511         lu_env_fini(env);
00512         OBD_FREE_PTR(env);
00513         return rc;
00514 }
00515 
00527 static int ofd_register_seq_exp(struct ofd_device *ofd)
00528 {
00529         struct seq_server_site  *ss = &ofd->ofd_seq_site;
00530         char                    *lwp_name = NULL;
00531         int                     rc;
00532 
00533         OBD_ALLOC(lwp_name, MAX_OBD_NAME);
00534         if (lwp_name == NULL)
00535                 GOTO(out_free, rc = -ENOMEM);
00536 
00537         rc = tgt_name2lwp_name(ofd_name(ofd), lwp_name, MAX_OBD_NAME, 0);
00538         if (rc != 0)
00539                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
00540 
00541         rc = lustre_register_lwp_item(lwp_name, &ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp,
00542                                       NULL, NULL);
00543         if (rc != 0)
00544                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
00545 
00546         rc = lustre_register_lwp_item(lwp_name,
00547                                       &ss->ss_server_fld->lsf_control_exp,
00548                                       ofd_register_lwp_callback, ofd);
00549         if (rc != 0) {
00550                 lustre_deregister_lwp_item(&ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp);
00551                 ss->ss_client_seq->lcs_exp = NULL;
00552                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
00553         }
00554 out_free:
00555         if (lwp_name != NULL)
00556                 OBD_FREE(lwp_name, MAX_OBD_NAME);
00557 
00558         return rc;
00559 }
00560 
00572 int ofd_seqs_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd)
00573 {
00574         int rc;
00575 
00576         rwlock_init(&ofd->ofd_seq_list_lock);
00577         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ofd->ofd_seq_list);
00578         ofd->ofd_seq_count = 0;
00579 
00580         rc = ofd_fid_init(env, ofd);
00581         if (rc != 0) {
00582                 CERROR("%s: fid init error: rc = %d\n", ofd_name(ofd), rc);
00583                 GOTO(out, rc);
00584         }
00585 
00586         rc = ofd_fld_init(env, ofd_name(ofd), ofd);
00587         if (rc < 0) {
00588                 CERROR("%s: Can't init fld, rc %d\n", ofd_name(ofd), rc);
00589                 GOTO(out_fid, rc);
00590         }
00591 
00592         rc = ofd_register_seq_exp(ofd);
00593         if (rc < 0) {
00594                 CERROR("%s: Can't init seq exp, rc %d\n", ofd_name(ofd), rc);
00595                 GOTO(out_fld, rc);
00596         }
00597 
00598         RETURN(0);
00599 
00600 out_fld:
00601         ofd_fld_fini(env, ofd);
00602 out_fid:
00603         ofd_fid_fini(env, ofd);
00604 out:
00605         return rc;
00606 }
00607 
00621 int ofd_fs_setup(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd,
00622                  struct obd_device *obd)
00623 {
00624         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(env);
00625         struct dt_object        *fo;
00626         int                      rc = 0;
00627 
00628         ENTRY;
00629 
00630         rc = ofd_seqs_init(env, ofd);
00631         if (rc)
00632                 GOTO(out, rc);
00633 
00634         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_FS_SETUP))
00635                 GOTO(out_seqs, rc = -ENOENT);
00636 
00637         lu_local_obj_fid(&info->fti_fid, OFD_HEALTH_CHECK_OID);
00638         memset(&info->fti_attr, 0, sizeof(info->fti_attr));
00639         info->fti_attr.la_valid = LA_MODE;
00640         info->fti_attr.la_mode = S_IFREG | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR;
00641         info->fti_dof.dof_type = dt_mode_to_dft(S_IFREG);
00642 
00643         fo = dt_find_or_create(env, ofd->ofd_osd, &info->fti_fid,
00644                                &info->fti_dof, &info->fti_attr);
00645         if (IS_ERR(fo))
00646                 GOTO(out_seqs, rc = PTR_ERR(fo));
00647 
00648         ofd->ofd_health_check_file = fo;
00649 
00650         RETURN(0);
00651 
00652 out_seqs:
00653         ofd_seqs_fini(env, ofd);
00654 out:
00655         return rc;
00656 }
00657 
00666 void ofd_fs_cleanup(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd)
00667 {
00668         int rc;
00669 
00670         ENTRY;
00671 
00672         ofd_seqs_fini(env, ofd);
00673 
00674         rc = dt_sync(env, ofd->ofd_osd);
00675         if (rc < 0)
00676                 CWARN("%s: can't sync OFD upon cleanup: %d\n",
00677                       ofd_name(ofd), rc);
00678 
00679         if (ofd->ofd_health_check_file) {
00680                 lu_object_put(env, &ofd->ofd_health_check_file->do_lu);
00681                 ofd->ofd_health_check_file = NULL;
00682         }
00683 
00684         EXIT;
00685 }
